attributes.action: Refund Stamp Duty to First Time Buyers of Property between 1 January 2010 and 24 March 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime Minister to refund Stamp Duty to first time buyers who bought property under the revised threshold of £250,000 prior to the Budget yesterday as this is grossly unfair to any first time buyers who bought property between 1st January and 24 March 2010.
